category: National Sports Festival Regulations/Article 6 (Restrictions on competition events)
contents: Article 6 (Restrictions on competition events) From 5 days before the date of the National Sports Festival until the end of the day, member organizations of the National Sports Council and their affiliated federations may not hold competition events for each event. However, in special circumstances, competition events for each sport may be held with prior approval from the Sports Council. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
